resources.string: The battery level is too low to run the camera. Please charge your phone.

Preparing SD card.

"Not enough memory in %1$s. Your file will be saved to %2$s. Free more memory in %3$s by connecting phone to PC or launching file manager.
Launch file manager now? Check your files in '%4$s'"
"Not enough memory in %1$s. Your file will be saved to %2$s. Free more memory in %3$s by connecting phone to PC or launching file manager."

"Not enough memory in all memory. Free more memory by connecting phone to PC or launching file manager."
Not enough space on internal storage
Not enough space on internal storage. To free up space, delete some files.
Not enough space on internal storage. File will be saved to SD card. To free up space, delete some files.
SD card has been removed. Insert the SD card again.

Photos will be automatically uploaded to U+ Box.
Say \"%s\" when you get ready to take a photo.
Say \"%s\" to take a photo.
Whiskey
To take a photo, say \"%1$s,\" \"%2$s,\" or \"%3$s.\"
To take a photo, say \"%s.\"

Automatically adjusting color.
Applies artistic effects to the pictures.

Applies vividy color effect to pictures.

Save images to internal memory.

Finds the color and light settings appropriate for the current environment.
Improves color qualities under different lighting conditions.
Automatically adjusts color.
Setting special colored filter effects.

Applying no colored filter effect.
Applying negative filter effect to invert the color of the video.
Applies vividy color effect to videos.
Applies Negative sepia color effect to videos.
Applies Blue color effect to videos.
Applies Posterize color effect to videos.
Applies Aqua color effect to videos.
Applies Pastel color effect to videos.
Camera Stopped.
Camera has stopped unexpectedly,need to restart.
"Don't show this again"

By selecting \"Tag Location\", this device will attach, embed and store geographical location data within each picture. Use caution when you send, share, distribute, transmit or copy these pictures since they contain the location where the picture was taken.
Video Length
Camera Settings
"Max. recording size reached. Recording will end soon."
Maximum recording time for MMS is about %d seconds.
Attachment file size limit is smaller than the min. recording size.
Shot & Clear

"Place your device on a steady surface and be sure there is no movement behind you.
Then step out of the camera view."
Capture sunsets and backlit photos
Adjust image color temperatures that are preset according to the light source.
Set colored filter effect when take pictures
No color effect
Capture images with color inverted.
Normal mode
Set colored filter effect when record videos.
Record videos with color inverted.
Set the sound while recording video
Beauty shot makes your face look brighter and smoother.
Beauty shot makes your face look brighter and smoother.
Continuous shot takes six photos immediately after each other. To select photo easily, turn Auto review on.
Live effect provides various visual effects when recording a video. Choose an effect, and begin recording.
Creates a wide photo of a panoramic view. Hold the phone horizontally, tap the shutter to start and slowly sweep the camera across the scene.
Capture the moments before you tap the shutter.
%1$s will be deleted. Delete?
Photo will be deleted. Delete?
Enable location services to use geotagging.
Picture
To review the missing moments, tap this button.
Select the photos that you want to keep and tap save button.
Time catch shot captures the missing moment before tapping the shutter. Only selected photos will be saved.
To display the photos that captured 1 second before the moment of shutter release, tap this button.
Tap outlined object to remove and tap save button.
Take up to 20 consecutive shots by holding down the shutter button.
Take up to 20 consecutive shots by holding down the shutter button.
Automatically identifies the characteristics of the scene and takes a photo.
"1. Drag to move small screen. 2. Touch and hold to re-size small screen. 3. Tap small screen to switch small and large screen."
Zoom in to enhance the audio zooming sound
Zoom in a certain area to increase sound sensitivity and decrease noise. Available only in landscape view. Keep the side microphones released while using this feature.
"1. Tap shutter to start VR panorama mode. 2. Fit focus area to blue guideline to take a photo. 3. Move camera to catch another focus areas and take photos. The photos come together into one image."
"1. Use magnifying glass to enlarge areas of the video. 2. Small screen shows the enlarged area. Drag the screen to move it."
Center
"To edit quick menus, long press the icon."
Please keep the camera lens clean for best image quality.
"To quickly check the taken photo, press and hold the gallery icon."
"To quickly check the taken photo, touch and hold the gallery icon."
Unable to use %s
Open the Quick Camera Case
Mode.
List view
Grid view
Normal
Take a photo with normal camera mode.
"Allows you to select a focus area to enlarge. View it in the small screen and take a video."
Tap the shutter button to start
Zoom not supported for this mode
Zoom not supported for this resolution
Please cancel \"Disable\" of au application.
Dynamic tone (HDR) guide
"1. Take a photo. 2. Tap any of the outlined objects to remove it from the photo. 3. Tap save button to save."
"1. Tap shutter button to start. 2. Pan your phone slowly to one direction. 3. Tap stop button when finished."
"1. Tap the shutter button to start. 2. Pan your phone slowly in one direction. 3. Fit visible area to blue guideline to take photo. 4. Tap the stop button when finished."
"1. Tap shutter to start VR panorama mode. 2. Fit focus area to blue guideline to take a photo. 3. Move camera to catch another focus areas and take photos. The photos come together into one image."

"1. Tap shutter button to start VR panorama mode. 2. Fit focus area to blue guide line to take a photo. 3. Move camera to catch another focus areas and take photos. The photos come together into one image. When taking VR Panorama photos, do not stand too close to the subject and keep a proper distance."
Take up to 20 consecutive shots by holding down the shutter button.
Beauty shot makes your face look brighter and smoother.
"1. Take a photo to start Time machine camera. 2. Tap gallery button to review the missing moments. 3. Select the photos that you want to keep. 4. Tap save button."
"1. Take a photo to start Time catch shot. 2. Tap gallery button to review the missing moments. 3. Select the photos that you want to keep. 4. Tap save button."
"1. Drag to move small screen. 2. Touch and hold to re-size small screen. 3. Tap small screen to switch small and large screen."
"1. Select effect that you want to use. 2. Tap record button and start recording."
Turning geotagging on
Battery at %s percent
Tap an object or adjust handler to change focus, then tap (#1#) in upper right corner to save
Tap an object or move the slide to change the focus. Then tap Save in the upper right corner.
Make a fist to take a photo
Take selfies with hand gesture. To take a photo, raise your hand until front camera detects it and a box appears on the screen. Then, make a fist to take a photo.
